price: (8) Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them are the Gardens of Pleasure,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātu al-naʿīmi
